"\u0009\u0009 Before you download, install, and use the Unlock Device App (\"App\") you acknowledge and assume complete responsibility for the quality and performance of this App, including but not limited to the following: once you activate the App you will not be able to return your ASUS product (“Original Product”) to the original locked condition; the Original Product with the activated App (\"Revised Product\") will not be deemed an Original Product; the Revised Product will no longer be covered under the Original Product warranty; the software of the Revised Product will no longer be deemed software of the Original Product and can no longer receive ASUS software updates; your purchased digital content may also be affected.
\u0009\u0009 You also acknowledge ASUS does not guarantee service satisfaction from any Revised Product, including events involving paid service requested by you to be performed to the Revised Product. Furthermore, such repaired Revised Product will not be covered under the warranty of the Original Product; the software of the repaired Revised Product will not be deemed the software of the Original Product and will not receive ASUS software updates.
You are strongly advised not to activate this App unless you fully understand and accept the risks that are involved."
I have read and agree to all the terms and conditions of the License Agreement.

"Before you download, install, and use the Unlock Device App (\"App\") you acknowledge and assume complete responsibility for the quality and performance of this App, including but not limited to the following: once you activate the App you will not be able to return your ASUS product (“Original Product”) to the original locked condition; the Original Product with the activated App (\"Revised Product\") will not be deemed an Original Product; the Revised Product will no longer be covered under the warranty of the Original Product; the software of the Revised Product will no longer be deemed software of the Original Product and can no longer receive ASUS software updates; your purchased digital content may also be affected. You also acknowledge that ASUS does not guarantee service satisfaction from any Revised Product, including events involving paid service you request to be performed on the Revised Product. Furthermore, such repaired Revised Product will not be covered under the warranty of the Original Product; the software of the repaired Revised Product will not be deemed software of the Original Product and will not receive ASUS software updates. You are strongly advised not to activate this App unless you fully understand and accept the risks that are involved.

(\"ASUS\") and you as a user of the ASUS Software (\"Software\") defined as set forth below. Nothing in this EULA intends to transfer any such IP Rights to you. By sending any information, material, ideas, concepts or techniques except for personal information to ASUS through the Software (\"Feedback\"), you acknowledge and agree that: (i) Your Feedback shall not contain confidential or proprietary information; (ii) ASUS is under no obligation of any kind to maintain confidentiality, expressed or implied, regarding the feedback; (iii) ASUS shall be entitled to use or disclose, at their own sole discretion, the feedback for any purpose, in any way, worldwide; (iv) Your Feedback shall become the property of ASUS without ASUS being under any obligation to you; and (v) You are not entitled to any compensation or reimbursement of any kind.

5. ASUS ALSO MAKES NO WARRANTY AS TO THE RESULTS THAT MAY BE OBTAINED FROM THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE OR AS TO THE ACCURACY OR RELIABILITY OF ANY INFORMATION OBTAINED THROUGH THIS SOFTWARE.
